page.title: 08Clive Garages
page.content: There are two garages in Clive, one is situated opposite the Village shop in the main street.This garage sells drinks and car oils and acessories. The other one is situated near the doctor's surgery and is rented from its present owner, Mr Mottershead, who is also the owner of a garage in Wem. The garage does not now sell petrol and just does servicing and repairs of vehicles. The premises are also used to sell frozen foods such as pies and vegetables, chips, ice-cream and also some household goods.
